Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.field

Class CardPlacement

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.field.CardPlacement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CardPlacement extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the placement of a card on the player's field.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardPlacement

      public CardPlacement(boolean isFront, Position pos, Card card)
      Constructs a new CardPlacement object.
      Parameters:
      isFront - A boolean indicating whether the card is placed on the front side.
      pos - The position where the card is placed.
      card - The card being placed.

  • Method Details

      public Card getCard()
      Gets the card placed in this CardPlacement.
      Returns:
      The card placed.

      public Corner getCorner(CornerPosition cornerPosition)
      Gets the corner of the card at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      cornerPosition - The position of the corner.
      Returns:
      The corner of the card.

    • isFront

      public boolean isFront()
      Gets the side of the card.
      Returns:
      True if the card is placed on the front side, false otherwise.

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Gets the position where the card is placed.

      The position of the card placement.

      Gets the kingdom symbol of the card.

    • isCornerCovered

      public boolean isCornerCovered(Position p)
      Checks if a specified position is covered by the card.
      Parameters:
      p - The position to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the position is covered by a corner of the card, false otherwise.

    • getCoveredCornerPosition

      public CornerPosition getCoveredCornerPosition(Position p) throws NoCoveredCornerException
      Gets the position of the covered corner relative to a specified position.
      Parameters:
      p - The position to which the covered corner's position is relative.
      Returns:
      The position of the covered corner relative to the specified position.
      Throws:
      NoCoveredCornerException - if there is no covered corner at the specified position.
